DOC.brief_summary: The study evaluates the effectiveness of surgical or non-surgical treatment for children type 1 humeral condyle fracture.Half of the participants receive surgical treatment and the other half receive non-surgical treatment
DOC.brief_title: Multi-center Study on Surgical or Non-surgical Treatment for Children Type 1 Humeral Condyle Fracture
